title: Reflected XSS in Search Function
description: The search functionality at /search.php is vulnerable to reflected Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) attacks. User input is not properly sanitized before being displayed in the response.
steps_to_reproduce:
1. Navigate to https://vulnerable-app.com/search.php
2. Enter <script>alert('XSS')</script> in the search field
3. Click Search
4. The JavaScript code will execute in the browser
